http:
  routers:
    omada-http:
      rule: Host(`omada.bourne.cloud`)
      service: omada-service
    omada-https:
      rule: Host(`omada.bourne.cloud`)
      service: omada-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    omada-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "https://192.168.1.18:8043"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
